ActiveHoursConfiguration.description: The active hours configuration for a Dev Box.

keepAwakeEnableStatus.description: Enables or disables whether the Dev Box should be kept awake during active hours.

autoStartEnableStatus.description: Enables or disables whether the Dev Box should be automatically started at commencement of active hours.

timeZone.description: The timezone of the active hours.

startTimeHour.description: The start time of the active hours.

endTimeHour.description: The end time of the active hours.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The identity type that created the resource.

createdAt.description: The timestamp the resource was created at.

resourceUri.description: The resource that is pending approval.

AutoStartEnableStatus.description: Enables or disables whether the Dev Box should be automatically started at commencement of active hours.

values.name: Enabled
values.description: Auto start is enabled.

values.name: Disabled
values.description: Auto start is disabled.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Azure REST API guidelines - https://aka.ms/AzureRestApiGuidelines#handling-errors.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

values.name: NotStarted
values.description: The operation has not started.

values.name: Running
values.description: The operation is in progress.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: The operation has completed successfully.

values.name: Failed
values.description: The operation has failed.

values.name: Canceled
values.description: The operation has been canceled by the user.

Azure.Core.azureLocation.description: Represents an Azure geography region where supported resource providers live.

uri.description: The unique URI of the catalog.

CustomizationGroup.description: Represents a list of tasks to apply to a Dev Box.

tasks.description:
Tasks to apply. Note by default tasks are excluded from the response when
listing customization groups. To include them, use the `include=tasks` query
parameter.

uri.description: The unique URI of the customization group.

startTime.description: Start time of the customization group, in RFC3339 format.

endTime.description: End time of the customization group, in RFC3339 format.

values.name: NotStarted
values.description: The customization group has not yet started.

values.name: Running
values.description: The customization group is currently executing.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: All tasks in the customization group successfully executed.

values.name: Failed
values.description: At least one task in the customization group failed.

values.name: ValidationFailed
values.description: At least one task in the customization group failed validation.

CustomizationTask.description: A customization task to run on a Dev Box.

displayName.description: Display name to help differentiate multiple instances of the same task.

timeoutInSeconds.description: Timeout, in seconds. Overrides any timeout provided on the task definition.

runAs.description: What account to run the task as.

logUri.description: The unique URI for retrieving the task logs.

startTime.description: Start time of the task, in RFC3339 format.

endTime.description: End time of the task, in RFC3339 format.

CustomizationTaskDefinition.description: Represents a task to be used in customizing a Dev Box.

catalogName.description: Name of the catalog that the task belongs to.

uri.description: The unique URI of the customization task.

required.description: Whether or not the parameter is required.

values.name: string
values.description: The parameter accepts a string value.

values.name: number
values.description: The parameter accepts a number value.

values.name: boolean
values.description: The parameter accepts a boolean value.

CustomizationTaskExecutionAccount.description: What account to run the task as.

values.name: System
values.description: The SYSTEM account.

values.name: User
values.description: The account of the signed in user.

CustomizationTaskList.description: Represents a list of tasks to apply to a Dev Box

CustomizationTaskListValidationError.description: All of the validation errors for a customization task.

target.description: The customization task that the error is about.

details.description: List of validation errors for the task.

CustomizationTaskListValidationOperation.description: The operation result of validating a list of customization tasks.

id.description: Fully qualified ID for the operation status.

startTime.description: The start time of the operation, in RFC3339 format.

endTime.description: The end time of the operation, in RFC3339 format.

percentComplete.description: Percent of the operation that is complete.

properties.description: Custom operation properties, populated only for a successful operation.

CustomizationTaskListValidationResult.description: The result of validating a list of customization tasks.

errors.description: List of validation errors. Absent if no errors.

CustomizationTaskListValidationStatus.description: Status of validating a list of customization tasks.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: Validation succeeded.

values.name: Failed
values.description: Validation failed.

values.name: NotStarted
values.description: The task has not yet started.

values.name: Running
values.description: The task is currently executing.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: The task successfully executed.

values.name: FailedValidation
values.description: The task reference is not valid.

values.name: Skipped
values.description: he task was skipped.

values.name: TimedOut
values.description: The task timed out.

values.name: Failed
values.description: The task failed to execute.

values.name: WaitingForUserInputUac
values.description: The task is awaiting the User Account Control (UAC) prompt to be approved. (See more at: https://learn.microsoft.com/windows/security/application-security/application-control/user-account-control/)

values.name: WaitingForUserSession
values.description: The task is awaiting the user to connect to the Dev Box to execute.

values.name: Monday
values.description: Monday

values.name: Tuesday
values.description: Tuesday

values.name: Wednesday
values.description: Wednesday

values.name: Thursday
values.description: Thursday

values.name: Friday
values.description: Friday

values.name: Saturday
values.description: Saturday

values.name: Sunday
values.description: Sunday

uri.description: The unique URI of the dev box.

name.description: Display name for the Dev Box.

projectName.description: Name of the project this Dev Box belongs to.

poolName.description: The name of the Dev Box pool this machine belongs to.

hibernateSupport.description: Indicates whether hibernate is enabled/disabled or unknown.

provisioningState.description: The current provisioning state of the Dev Box.

actionState.description:
The current action state of the Dev Box. This is state is based on previous
action performed by user.

powerState.description: The current power state of the Dev Box.

uniqueId.description:
A unique identifier for the Dev Box. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g.
00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

error.description: Provisioning or action error details. Populated only for error states.

location.description:
Azure region where this Dev Box is located. This will be the same region as the
Virtual Network it is attached to.

osType.description: The operating system type of this Dev Box.

user.description: The AAD object id of the user this Dev Box is assigned to.

hardwareProfile.description: Information about the Dev Box's hardware resources.

storageProfile.description: Storage settings for this Dev Box.

imageReference.description: Information about the image used for this Dev Box.

createdTime.description: Creation time of this Dev Box, in RFC3339 format.

lastConnectedTime.description: Last time a user connected to this Dev Box, in RFC3339 format.

localAdministrator.description: Indicates whether the owner of the Dev Box is a local administrator.

activeHoursConfiguration.description: The active hours configuration for this Dev Box, if enabled.

singleSignOnStatus.description: Indicates whether single sign on is enabled/disabled or unknown.

DevBoxAction.description: An action which will take place on a Dev Box.

uri.description: The unique URI for the Dev Box action.

actionType.description: The action that will be taken.

sourceId.description: The id of the resource which triggered this action.

sourceUri.description: The URI of the resource which triggered this action.

sourceType.description: The type of the resource which triggered this action.

suspendedUntil.description: The earliest time that the action could occur (UTC), in RFC3339 format.

next.description: Details about the next run of this action.

uri.description: The unique URI of the action.

result.description: The result of the delay operation on this action.

error.description: Information about the error that occurred. Only populated on error.

DevBoxActionDelayResultStatus.description: The result of the delay operation on this action.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: The delay operation succeeded.

values.name: Failed
values.description: The delay operation failed.

DevBoxActionSourceType.description: The type of the resource which triggered the action.

values.name: Pool
values.description: The action was triggered by a Dev Box pool.

values.name: Schedule
values.description: The action was triggered by a Dev Box schedule.

values.name: Admin
values.description: The action was triggered by a Dev Box admin.

values.name: Project
values.description: The action was triggered by a Project.

DevBoxActionType.description: The type of action which will take place on a Dev Box.

values.name: Stop
values.description: The action will stop the Dev Box.

values.name: Delete
values.description: The action will delete the Dev Box.

name.description: Name of the dev box addon.

kind.description: The type of the Dev Box addon.

actionState.description:
The current action state of the Dev Box addon. This state is based on previous
action performed by user.

error.description: Creation, deletion or action error details. Populated only for error states.

DevBoxAddOnKind.description: The kind of Dev Box addon.

values.name: DevBoxTunnel
values.description: The Dev Box Tunnel addon.

startTime.description: he time the operation started, in RFC3339 format.

endTime.description: The time the operation finished, in RFC3339 format.

error.description: Provisioning or operation error details. Populated only for error states.

values.description: The operation represents a Dev Box align to the current network connection.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: Dev Box was successfully provisioned.

values.name: Failed
values.description: Dev Box failed to provision.

values.name: Canceled

values.name: PendingApproval

DevBoxRepairOperation.description: Information about a start operation on a Dev Box.

result.description: The result of the repair operation.

repairOutcome.description: The outcome of the repair operation.

message.description: The result message associated with the repair operation.

DevBoxRepairOutcome.description: The action taken during a repair operation.

values.name: FixApplied
values.description: A fix for an issue was automatically applied to the Dev Box.

values.name: IssuesDetected
values.description: One or more issues was detected on the Dev Box, but they could not be fixed automatically.

values.name: NoIssuesDetected
values.description: The service did not identify any issues on the Dev Box.

DevBoxRestartOperation.description: Information about a restart operation on a Dev Box.

DevBoxRestoreSnapshotOperation.description: Information about a restore from snapshot operation on a Dev Box.

snapshotId.description: Specifies the snapshot id that was used for the restore operation.
The id of the snapshot. Should be treated as opaque string.

createdTime.description: The datetime that the snapshot was created, in RFC3339 format.

expirationTime.description: The datetime when the snapshot expires, will only be shown for a manual snapshot, in RFC3339 format.

snapshotType.description: The type of the snapshot indicates whether it is manual or automatic.

DevBoxStartOperation.description: Information about a start operation on a Dev Box.

DevBoxStopOperation.description: Information about a stop operation on a Dev Box.

hostingResourceName.description:
The hosting resource name, either a DevBox or HyperV.
Leaving it empty or `Default` if it's for DevBox.

DevBoxTunnelStatus.description: The detailed status of Dev Box Tunnel addon.

values.name: Enabled
values.description: The tunnel is active and can be connected.

values.name: Disabled
values.description: The tunnel is inactive and can't be connected.

values.name: Suspended
values.description: The tunnel is suspended due to hibernation or other reasons.

uri.description: The unique URI of the pool.

location.description: Azure region where Dev Boxes in the pool are located.

osType.description: The operating system type of Dev Boxes in this pool.

hardwareProfile.description: Hardware settings for the Dev Boxes created in this pool.

hibernateSupport.description: Indicates whether hibernate is enabled/disabled or unknown.

storageProfile.description: Storage settings for Dev Box created in this pool.

imageReference.description: Image settings for Dev Boxes create in this pool.

localAdministrator.description:
Indicates whether owners of Dev Boxes in this pool are local administrators on
the Dev Boxes.

stopOnDisconnect.description: Stop on disconnect configuration settings for Dev Boxes created in this pool.

stopOnNoConnect.description: Stop on no connect configuration settings for Dev Boxes created in this pool.

healthStatus.description:
Overall health status of the Pool. Indicates whether or not the Pool is
available to create Dev Boxes.

activeHoursConfiguration.description: The default active hours configuration for Dev Boxes created in this pool.

singleSignOnStatus.description: Indicates whether single sign on is enabled/disabled or unknown.

PoolActiveHoursConfiguration.description: The default active hours configuration settings.

keepAwakeEnableStatus.description: Enables or disables whether the Dev Box should be kept awake during active hours.

autoStartEnableStatus.description: Enables or disables whether the Dev Box should be automatically started at commencement of active hours.

defaultTimeZone.description: The default IANA timezone id of the active hours.

defaultStartTimeHour.description: The default start time of the active hours.

defaultEndTimeHour.description: The default end time of the active hours.

defaultDaysOfWeek.description: The days of the week that active hours features will be enabled.

daysOfWeekLimit.description: The maximum amount of days per week that a user can enable active hours related features.

values.description: The pool health status is not known.

values.description: The pool health status waiting for health checks to run.

values.name: Healthy
values.description: The pool health status is healthy.

values.name: Warning
values.description: The pool health status has one or more warnings.

values.name: Unhealthy
values.description: The pool health status is not healthy.

StopOnDisconnectConfiguration.description: Stop on disconnect configuration settings for Dev Boxes created in this pool.

status.description:
Indicates whether the feature to stop the devbox on disconnect once the grace
period has lapsed is enabled.

gracePeriodMinutes.description:
The specified time in minutes to wait before stopping a Dev Box once disconnect
is detected.

StopOnDisconnectEnableStatus.description: Indicates whether the feature to stop the devbox on disconnect once the grace period has lapsed is enabled.

values.name: Enabled
values.description: Stop on disconnect is enabled on the Dev Box.

values.name: Disabled
values.description: Stop on disconnect is not enabled on the Dev Box.

StopOnNoConnectConfiguration.description: Stop on no connect configuration settings for Dev Boxes created in this pool.

status.description: Enables the feature to stop a started Dev Box when it has not been connected to, once the grace period has lapsed.

gracePeriodMinutes.description: The specified time in minutes to wait before stopping a Dev Box if no connection is made. This will only be present if stop on no connect is enabled.

StopOnNoConnectEnableStatus.description: Stop on no connect enable or disable status.

values.name: Enabled
values.description: Stop on no connect is enabled on the Dev Box.

values.name: Disabled
values.description: Stop on no connect is not enabled on the Dev Box.

StorageProfile.description: Storage settings for the Dev Box's disks.

osDisk.description: Settings for the operating system disk.

UserActiveHoursConfiguration.description: Manual user set active hours configuration.

timeZone.description: The timezone of the active hours.

startTimeHour.description: The start time of the active hours.

endTimeHour.description: The end time of the active hours.

Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.name: api-version
Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.description: The API version to use for this operation.

Azure.Core.MaxPageSizeQueryParameter.name: maxpagesize
Azure.Core.MaxPageSizeQueryParameter.description: The maximum number of result items per page.

Azure.Core.SelectQueryParameter.name: select
Azure.Core.SelectQueryParameter.description: Select the specified fields to be included in the response.

Azure.Core.SkipQueryParameter.name: skip
Azure.Core.SkipQueryParameter.description: The number of result items to skip.

Azure.Core.TopQueryParameter.name: top
Azure.Core.TopQueryParameter.description: The number of result items to return.

DelayUntilQueryParameter.name: until
DelayUntilQueryParameter.description: The time to delay the Dev Box action or actions until, in RFC3339 format.

DeleteAtQueryParameter.name: deleteAt
DeleteAtQueryParameter.description: The scheduled deletion time of the Dev Box, in RFC3339 format.

DevBoxAddOnNameParameter.name: addOnName
DevBoxAddOnNameParameter.description: The name of the Dev Box addon.

DevBoxNameParameter.name: devBoxName
DevBoxNameParameter.description: The name of a Dev Box.

ForceDeleteEnvironmentQueryParameter.name: force
ForceDeleteEnvironmentQueryParameter.description: The query option to force environment deletion even if the environment definition does not exist. This is a best-effort delete, and anything custom that forces resource creation beyond the associated resource group may not be deleted.

HibernateQueryParameter.name: hibernate
HibernateQueryParameter.description: Optional parameter to hibernate the dev box.

ProjectNameParameter.name: projectName
ProjectNameParameter.description: The DevCenter Project upon which to execute operations.

SnapshotIdQueryParameter.name: snapshotId
SnapshotIdQueryParameter.description: Required parameter that specifies the snapshot id to use for the restore operation.

UserIdParameter.name: userId
UserIdParameter.description: The AAD object id of the user. If value is 'me', the identity is taken from the authentication context.
